body.name: Babyletto Scoot 3-in-1 Convertible Crib with Toddler Bed Conversion Kit in Natural Walnut, Greenguard Gold Certified
features: MID-CENTURY MODERN STYLE: The Scoot's angular feet and contrast horizontal lines create a charming retro impression that is current and on-trend. Complete your nursery with the Scoot 3-drawer dresser.

GREENGUARD Gold Certified: The Scoot has undergone rigorous scientific testing for over 10,000 chemical emissions and VOCs. It contributes to cleaner indoor air, creating a healthier environment for your baby to sleep, play, and grow

3-IN-1 CONVERTABILITY & ADJUSTABLE HEIGHT: The Scoot transitions from crib to toddler bed and daybed, with an included toddler bed conversion kit. The low profile design and 4 adjustable mattress positions make it easy to put a newborn to rest

SAFE FOR BABE: We go the extra step to ensure your babe's safety. Finished in a non-toxic multi-step painting and staining process that is lead and phthalate safe which exceeds ASTM International and U.S. CPSC safety standards

SUSTAINABLE DESIGN: Made with sustainably sourced solid New Zealand pine wood, one of the most renewable woods available. Our hidden hardware ensures a clean look with no visible screws or bolts seen on the furniture exterior
body.description: The Scoot 3-in-1 Convertible Crib is the perfect centerpiece to your mid-century modern nursery. With an included conversion kit to go from crib to toddler bed to daybed, made with sustainable pine wood and GREENGUARD GOLD Certified.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Palma 7-Drawer Double Dresser Pure Core Crib Mattress Palma Mid-Century 4-in-1 Convertible Crib Madison Swivel Glider Booksee Shelf Set Shown In Warm White / Walnut - Warm White / Walnut Ivory Boucle Acrylic

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Crib Ready For Baby's Arrival
reviews.reviewText: I got this Natural Walnut Babyletto Scoot 3-in-1 Convertible Crib with Toddler Bed Conversion Kit for my grandson who is due to arrive in April 2024. Itis beautiful and so much nicer looking set up in baby's bedroom than on the computer!It was packed wonderfully and arrived in perfect condition - sometimes large items are not packaged well from the factory and end up damaged during shipping - but this was packed great!My son -in-law had it assembled in about 45 minutes - he said the instructions were great and he had no issues at all putting it together.I would definitely recommend this crib to anyone in the market for a beautiful crib that will eventually convert into a toddler bed in a few years.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it- great design, looks good and very sturdy
reviews.reviewText: Love this crib. its very pretty to look at and very sturdy too. The bars are smooth and don't hurt my child. Have not needed to use crib liners. Highly recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2022
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I love this crib! You need two people to put this together, it has a lot of pieces. It feels sturdy and looks great! There are three settings for the mattress height which is a huge plus! It also grows with your baby. Once the baby gets to toddler age, you can change it to a daybed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this crib for my son's first child due next month. My son and his wife are very happy with the crib and said it was very easy to build. They said one piece was damaged when it arrived and they contacted the manufacturer and they promptly sent a replacement piece to them. So far their little cavapoo has been the only one to try the crib out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy - Beautiful Design - Corners DO line up!
reviews.reviewText: Love this crib! It came super quickly and was in perfect condition. It’s easy to assemble and comes with the toddler bed conversion kit included! (At least at the time I made my purchase) It is very sturdy and exceeds safety standards. I am extremely pleased.UPDATE: I have noticed a lot of comments stating the corners of the rails overlap at the top. I can understand why you might think this, I actually thought they had sent me the wrong rail at first! My father (way handier than I am!) explained that you had to pull the corners even while you tighten the screws connecting the rails. It has something to do with tension - don’t ask me. Anyway, he was right and the corners line up perfectly!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 12, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Eco friendly, great quality, low profile
reviews.reviewText: I love the small footprint of this crib. It is not gigantic but perfectly roomy for a baby. The rail is low, which was important for me since I had a c-section. The eco-friendly, low VOC finish means it’s safe and leave your nursery smelly. We have put together a few cribs and I feel like this was by far the easiest. The design is great, the crib is very solid, and it looks much more expensive than it actually was. We are pleased..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2016
reviews.reviewText: Extremely happy with this crib. It is a bit time consuming to assemble, but on the bright side, seems like adjusting heights should not be too complicated. It looks very elegant and stylish, and we've had no complaints using it for the last 6 months. A standard crib mattress fits snugly. I will note that the white finish does get dinged somewhat easily (my older children have left scratches with toys), but for the money I think this is a great buy. Also like the fact that it includes the toddler rail, which many comparable cribs do not. Would definitely recommend to other parents. Part of the reason I decided to get the Scoot as opposed to the Lolly or some other Babyletto cribs is that the top rail is wood (as opposed to painted), which I prefer when the baby starts gnawing on it while teething.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Instructions didn’t match the crib. Leg broke.
reviews.reviewText: The instructions did not match this crib. It took me a while to figure it out. I thought I was missing pieces but it turns out the base is one whole piece, not 4 as listed in the instructions. More annoying than anything I get the impression I have a newer or older model. After taking twice as long to put this together, due to the instructions discrepancies, one of the legs became wobbly. I secured it with wood glue but definitely not what I would expect from an item of this quality. With all of the negativity out of the way, this is a very nice crib. Super sturdy and definitely high end. I may have just been a one off so I wouldn’t let my review deter you from purchasing. Just be aware these issues can arise.
La misma marca la venden en tiendas al triple de precio. Tenia miedo que fuera un fraude, pero no! El producto llegó rapidísimo, bien embalado y en buenas condiciones. Sin duda lo recomiendo!
El producto me llego golpeado/dañado de algunas partes
Una de las piezas de madera llegó dañada, necesito poder reemplazarla para poder montar la cuna, cual proceso aplica?Saludos.
